name: womanhood
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being a woman, or the period of time when someone is a woman: The novel deals with a teenage girl's journey towards womanhood.
the qualities that are considered typical of a woman: Brigitte Bardot was the dominant image of womanhood in French cinema during the 1960s.
formal all women considered as a group: the womanhood of the nation
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being a woman: The girl had matured into womanhood.
